message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOG_XFV_METHOD_LOCATION
message.locale: The Location must be selected if Method is specified as '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOG_NO_SELECTION_FOR_PREVIEW
message.locale: Please select at least one Contact to preview.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOG_START_DATE_TIME_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: Contact Start Date/Time must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOG_CONTACT_END_DATETIME
message.locale: Contact End Date/Time must not be earlier than Contact Start Date/Time.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOG_LINK_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Contact Link Type must be specified.

message.name: INF_ALL_CONTACTLOG_CANNOT_BE_DISPLAYED
message.locale: Not all contacts were able to be displayed ("%1n" out of "%2n" contacts were displayed).

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOG_EDITABLE_PERIOD_ELAPSED
message.locale: You can no longer modify the narrative text as the editable period has elapsed.
